question.title: Cannot import jackson library, read many posts and blogs but i still have issues
question.body:
a month ago started this roadmap of projects https://roadmap.sh/backend/projects?difficulty=beginner with the first project, a CLI TaskTracker.

I never used CLI for a project, but didnt think it was gonna be a problem. In this project i need to use a json library and found a tutorial to install jackson library. Since the moment i installed it (or at leats thats what i thought), the problems started. In the video, it says i should use maven for it, and changed the project. I used git bash to run the code (it worked well with similar downloaded test projects)

Every time i try to run it, the console gives me this message:

error: package com.fasterxml.jackson.core does not exist

error: package com.fasterxml.jackson.annotations does not exist

error: package com.fasterxml.jackson.databind does not exist

Usually i read a few posts and encounter the anwer, but this time it seems like no one have this very same issue. Its been two weeks since i had this problema and read more than fifty posts and a few useless installation guides.

I need to mention that the project worked well in the console BEFORE adding the library.

The only thing im certain of is that for some reason, maven is not importing the library from the POM.xml nor the ClassPath.

This is my pom:

<project xmlns="https://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="https://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="https://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
      <artifactId>jackson-core</artifactId>
      <version>2.18.2</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
      <artifactId>jackson-annotations</artifactId>
      <version>2.18.2</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
      <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
      <version>2.18.2</version>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>
  <groupId>TaskTracker.maven.org</groupId>
  <artifactId>TaskTracker</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <name>TaskTracker</name>
</project>

A dont know where else to look, so any help is welcome.

Currently im using eclipse, JDK 22. I dont know the difference between a version that uses classpath or modules, but i think that uses classpath.

Thing i already tried:

  • Changing to Maven

  • Making the project from the start (3 times)

  • Changing the pom code (changing between versions and so)

  • Adding extra dependencies

  • Import the .jar file to the classpath

  • Created a module-info file

  • Deleted the module-info file

Errors when tried mvn clean package:

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] -----------------< TaskTracker.maven.org:TaskTracker >------------------
[INFO] Building TaskTracker 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
[INFO]   from pom.xml
